Definition: Identifier for the assay that is at least unique within the project
The type of experiment performed, eg ATAC-seq or seqFISH
Ontology: ontology field- e.g. EFO or OBI

Definition: More specific type or assay like bulk nascent RNAseq or single cell ATACseq
Ontology: ontology field- e.g. EFO or OBI

Definition: Owner of the assay (who made the experiment?).
The type of instrument used to perform the assay, eg Illumina HiSeq 4000 or Fluidigm C1 microfluidics platform
Ontology: ontology field- e.g. EFO or OBI

Definition: Technique used to extract the nucleic acid from the cell
Ontology: ontology field- e.g. EFO or OBI

Definition: Technique used to amplify a cDNA library
Ontology: ontology field- e.g. EFO or OBI

Definition: Accession numbers from external resources to which assay or protocol information was submitted
Ontology: eg protocols.io, AE, GEO accession number, etc

Definition: Internal code name for easy identification (like a keyword)
Date of assay creation
Number of samples analyzed in this assay
Paired fastq files or not
Pipeline used to process data and version
The strandedness of the cDNA library
Who processed the data
Organism origin
If it is internal or external data
Path to files
Short description of the assay
ID of the experiment/assay in labguru_ID
